description: This table contains the contact methods for patient follow-up for NSQIP registry data for the surgeries that are selected for NSQIP submission. It is used in conjunction with NSQIP_INFO table.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NSQIP_CONTACT_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The contact method that was used to follow the case. It is used only if the case was not followed for full 30 days.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Phone


Letter


Documentation


Other


Email
